reviewText: Minigame Party VR is a great game overall that is definitely worth the while if you have a HTC Vive. Itâ€™s an excellent experience in VR, lots of fun, and can become very competitive, very quickly. All of the minigames are well made and the controls are very natural. I found myself picking up how to play the games in less than a minute and this goes for my friends and family also. Overall, this is a great game and I definitely would recommend getting it if you have a Vive.
